items.description: System health check (memory/HEALTH.md): knowledge growth, accuracy, compactness, belief evolution, task throughput
Tool consolidation: audit tools/ for duplicates, dead code, lost-embedding (P-134)
Cross-variant harvest: compare active children for convergent/divergent/novel findings
Scan PRINCIPLES.md for redundant/overlapping principles -- merge or supersede
Measure proxy K (python3 tools/proxy_k.py --save): track bootstrap description length across sessions (F116, PHIL-8)

Re-swarm docs/PAPER.md: read current beliefs/PHILOSOPHY.md + beliefs/CORE.md + memory/INDEX.md, check paper for drift, fan-out agents to update stale sections, update paper_version header. File challenges for any contradictions found.
